name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: BriefMe: Your Document, Simplified and Explained

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: BriefMe uses advanced AI to deliver instant summaries and key insights from your documents

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Features:
✔️ Summarization: Generates concise, accurate summaries of your uploaded documents, highlighting key points and main topics.
✔️ Interactive Q&A: Ask questions about your document for deeper understanding.
✔️ Contextual Highlights: Quickly locate and view the relevant section of the document linked to the summary for better understanding.

Benefits:
👉 Save Time: Understand your documents without reading through every page.
👉Enhanced Productivity: Focus on what matters most with summaries and insights.
👉Effortless Interaction: Ask questions to get more context and clarity, instantly.

BriefMe adheres to Chrome Web Store policies, ensuring a secure and seamless user experience. We prioritize your privacy and use data solely to enhance summarization accuracy and improve interactivity.

By installing BriefMe, you agree to the Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.
